The video is good quality.  The audio has the distinct theater sound (hollow, slight echo) but it is very clear and nothing missing.  There are not sync problems.  Worth the DL unless you are looking for perfect quality.
Wait for at least LINE audio. This one sucks.

A: 7

Great video quality for a cam. Audio wasn't great but was tolerable.
